title: Tech pushes Nikkei higher even as U.S. CPI caution prevails - Economic Times
content: Tech pushes Nikkei higher even as U.S. CPI caution prevails  Economic Times
description: "Japanese shares rebounded as Nasdaq futures gained (in Asian trading hours), but the upside was capped because investors were cautious ahead of the U.S. CPI (consumer price index) report after strong labour data," said Takatoshi Itoshima, a strategist at Pictet Asset Management.
